data.text: @ahillebrandt Hi Angela! We absolutely appreciate your business and your patience. We are currently receiving an influx of messages. If your concern has not been resolved, please send us a DM. - GM
@alaKimi Please know that care and accuracy in baggage handling is continually stressed at Allegiant. Should you need any additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us in a DM. - GM

@alaKimi We truly regret any inconvenience this situation may have caused. We have advised the management at BNA of your concern, so that they can review it for opportunities to provide a better travel experience.
@alaKimi Hi there! We are so sorry to hear this. Can you tell us the flight number so we may look into this for you? - GM
@z_music_lover Hi Izaiah! We're sorry for the hold, if you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@VictoriaIdoni Hi Victoria! We're sorry for the hold, if you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@drewonmoney Hi Andrew! We're sorry for the hold, if you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@natalieamaral_ Hi Nat! We're sorry for the hold, if you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@awholedamnbiome Hi Frost! We're sorry for the hold, if you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@face_ngo Hi there! We're so sorry to hear this, if you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@SeajaySmiles Hi Seajay! We're so sorry for the hold. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@thomasburchett4 Hi Thomas! We're sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM, and we will be happy to review this for you. - GM
@5FDPChrisKael Hi Chris! We're sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@august_vasquez Hi Aug! We are so sorry for the hold. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@Stevekrk Hi Steve! We're so sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. If you still need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM
@plainjade_ Hi Jade! We're so sorry for the hold. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@ImaniSuzanne Hi Suzanne! We're sorry to learn about your mom. We hope she's doing better. Please feel free to send us a DM or a PM on our social media platform for assistance at any time. - GM
@TheTrace7 At this time we don't have a return date for the route. But we invite you to join our email list: https://t.co/KYVdXwONUs - GM

urls.title: Join our Email List | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Be the first to know about Allegiant's sale fares, special offers, new route announcements and schedule extensions! Sign up today and start saving!

data.text: @sammie__anne Hi Sam! We're so sorry to see your bag is damaged. Please send us a message https://t.co/pRy6k7IsSK - GM

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @DAMiami89 We're sorry you feel this way. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@twinscrollgt35r Hi Michael! Thank you for letting us know. We have alerted and begun an investigation. - GM
@timospears So happy to hear that! We hope you to see Miley soon. 💙🧡💛 - GM
@marylynnlaugh Hi Mary! We're sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@rrauscher See you soon! 🥰 - GM
@timospears We're so sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM if you still need assistance. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@JessicaW031 Please send us a DM and we will be happy to help. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@DawnaDaidone 🤗😍😘🥰
@ReneeFetting 😍😍😍😍

Clear skies and summer vibes! 😎

📸: new.england_planespotting https://t.co/jMpAQXk9VJ

@SamuelMaw If you would like to ensure that your entire party is seated together, we strongly recommend purchasing seat selections in advance. Upon check-in, our system is designed to assign each minor next to an adult on the itinerary. - GM
@JonLu19 Hi there! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@TeddyBe28152748 Hi Teddy! We're sorry to learn you are having a hard time reaching us. If you need assistance, feel free to send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@cmhllh2007 Good morning! 😍😍😍😍 - GM

@LightGoddess44 Hi there! You can certainly add a pet to your existing reservation by going under "Manage Trip" on our official website. If you have trouble with that, feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@ErinnBurrSir Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@maximeismer Hi Maxi! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. Our team will be happy to look into this for you. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@bonfirelights94 Hi Elizabeth! We're sorry for the hold. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@IJust6eCoolinIt If you are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@IJust6eCoolinIt Hi there! We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call in our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone, as all calls are answered in the order received. You can also send us a DM. - C
@bballbillie1107 Great question, Billie! Please send us a private message so we can discuss further! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@EatCrowJoe I' so sorry to hear that, Joe. If you need assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@Dawn4Math That's what we love to hear! Thanks for flying with us, Dawn! - SG
@LorenaInLA Washington wine country sounds splendid! Where do we sign up?? 😉 - SG

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: Did you know today is also #InternationalFlightAttendantDay? To flight attendants everywhere, thank you for being there for us the moment we step onboard. Thank you for keeping us safe. And thank you for helping us make memories that will last a lifetime. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/GbcAEIlLp8
@dpSarmaji Hi there! Our ticket counters will open two hours prior to the estimated time of departure, but not before then. - C
@MeezyNaNa Our records indicate that you were able to confirm your booking after one of our team members helped you in a DM. We are happy to see that your issue was resolved. - C

@erinsimondsss Hi Erin! We're so sorry to hear your flight was delayed. Unfortunately, disruptions in service are sometimes necessary in air travel. If you are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM. - C
@_wdoug I'm so sorry to hear that, Will! If you are still in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a private message so one of our team members can help. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@KassieME I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble, Kassie! Please send us a private message so our team can take a look at what's going on. - SG
@BoujeeInBoston I'm so sorry to hear that, Jill. Please send us a private message so our team can look into this further. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@Stayoffmyyard That's so wonderful to hear! Thank you for recognizing their hard work! 🙌🙌 - SG

@BShroats5 That's so cool, Bret! Be sure to let the flight crew know it's her first flight, and snap a couple photos to share with us, too! We just love welcoming people for their first trip up to 30,000 feet! - SG
@huckleberryhum1 I'm so sorry to hear you feel that way. If you need assistance, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@LarrytheGM I'm so sorry to hear that, Larry. We'll certainly share your feedback with our Houston team so they can address any issues. If you need any further assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
This Memorial Day, above all else, we remember and honor those who've made the ultimate sacrifice for our nation. https://t.co/TzjuKNMrzY

data.text: @cultheroe Hi Rafael! We so sorry to hear of your negative experience. If you are in need of assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@thamilton0225 Hi there! Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information so that we can look into this for you. - C

@SdMerlins Hi there! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone, as all calls are answered in the order received. If you are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@raybri2 Our records indicate that a member of our team has addressed your concerns in a DM. - C

@jfer421 Hi Jenn! Our website is up and running as it should be at this time. If you are experiencing issues, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that we can troubleshoot with you. - C
@haileybaca2 Our records indicate that a member of our team has addressed your concerns in a DM. - C

@MReHvolutionary Allegiant prides itself in hiring and serving a diverse group of people. Our policies prohibit discrimination to anyone, colleagues or customers, on any basis. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your experience, so we can look into this for you. - C

Your next vacation is calling. Time to pick up the phone.

data.text: @allynoel2012 I'm sincerely sorry to hear that, Allison. Please feel free to send us a PM so we can review the details of your situation. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@BradyStockard I'm so sorry to hear you feel that way, Brady. If you need assistance from our team, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@IDripMotivation If you are still in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a private message! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@mrosen23 Thanks so much for your feedback, Mike! We'll definitely evaluate those options! - SG

@LoveeBuggg143 I'm sorry to hear that, Sierra-Lynn. Unfortunately, we are experiencing a very high call volume right now. If you need assistance, please feel free to send us a private message! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@amyziel Hi Amy! Please send us a private message so we can look into your specific itinerary! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@jessicabealer I'm so sorry to hear that, Jessica. We expect our team members to be professional and respectful to every customer at all times. We will certainly address your concern with our team in Rapid City. Thank you for bringing their behavior to our attention. - SG

@jray129 Hello Jason! We are very sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. If you are seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@ameliarussell15 Hi Amelia! We are so sorry to hear that you experienced a delay while traveling with us. If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@lb_theegreat Hi Lee! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know ho we may be able to help you. - C
@ToneLoc79 Hi Tony! We are sorry to hear that your first experience traveling with us did not meet your expectations. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@charissac_ We LOVE hearing this! Thank you for recognizing our efforts. 💙🧡💛 - C

@kyhanlin Hi Kylie! Thanks for contacting Allegiant. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the details of your request. - C
@Garcat20 Hi Casey! We are so sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@James31927856 Hi James! The determining factors in when, where, and how often we fly are numerous and ever-evolving. These factors include but are not limited to: demand for the service, aircraft/crew availability, and airport/ATC scheduling. - C

@mindsmattersmd Hi there! We are sorry to learn of your disappointment. If you are seeking assistance or have specific questions regarding a reservation that you have with us, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@TessBastiani Hi Tess! We're sorry to hear about this. If your best friend is in need of assistance, they are welcome to reach out to us directly. - C
@claiireee_ Hi Claire! If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@tstrahle Hi Tom! If you are not checking a bag and you have checked-in for your flight in advance online or via our mobile app, you can go directly to your gate. - C

@Boombeard1 Hi there! Name changes are not permitted, in accordance with our terms and conditions. Learn more here: https://t.co/4piCTDq7Ra If you have questions or concerns aside from that, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

urls.title: Terms & Conditions | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Airline Terms & Conditions on credits, refunds, itinerary changes, cancellation, taxes & fees, and no-shows.

data.text: @Coach_Bullock Hi Ben! We're so sorry to hear about this. If you are still in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details so that we may look into your options with you. - C
@simscc1 Hi Cathy! If you are still in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@uncletoto08 We're so sorry to hear this and we apologize for any inconvenience you are experiencing at this time. Unfortunately, disruptions in service are a necessary evil in air travel. If you need assistance, please send us a DM letting us know how we can help you. - C

@LiveAstrologer Hi Anna! Please be aware that you can add a request for wheelchair assistance on our official website both at the time of booking and afterwards, without having to hold. If you should need assistance in the future, you can always send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@BethAmbrose3 We're so sorry to hear about this! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information, letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@billybunnies We’re so sorry to hear about this! If you were unable to report this issue at the airport, please email us here: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K so that the appropriate department can look into this situation for you. - C

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @dquinnj Allegiant welcomes passengers traveling with a fully task-trained service animal. To verify the training of the animal, Allegiant requires the following documentation for travel with a fully trained service animal: https://t.co/fAPiueV24F - C

@str8churlish We're sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. Unfortunately, disruptions in service can sometimes occur with little notice. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@MJDSVT We're sorry to hear you had a negative experience while traveling with us. If you are seeking assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C
@Jillandkate That's what we love, love, love to hear! Have a great time in Portsmouth! - SG
@realmorganc Hi Morgan! Unfortunately, we're experiencing a very high call volume. If you still need assistance, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@GrossAssGains I'm sorry to hear that, Ben. We've been experiencing a very high call volume as of late. If you still need assistance, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@repaydebt Thanks for sharing the love, Thomas! Hope you had a wonderful flight! - SG
@SauceCastillo7 Great question, Mark! You can use the voucher to book travel for anyone you'd like. However, you have to use the same email address that you used on your original itinerary! - SG

@MaryTricca I'm so sorry to hear that, Mary! Delays are never fun, but we would never compromise safety to meet an on-time departure or arrival. If you have additional questions, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSIn3tRa - SG

@Twohig11 I'm so sorry to hear that you didn't have a good experience. Please feel free to send us a private message so we can gather additional feedback to share with our teams and address any issues. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@iflyboise Such a fun day! - SG
